name: Poogaboo: La Pulga 2
description: "Poogaboo: La Pulga 2" is the sequel to Indescomp's Bugaboo (The Flea). Conserving the same gaming style and argument of his predecessor, now, you will find a lot of enemies: flies, spiders, flying dragons..., etc etc; the dragon only can be avoided, but the flies can be eaten and as a result, your time to abandon the cave will be increased. The caves are filled of randomly placed rocks and you can jump to left, right or up to jump on them and manage to find the exit.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, DOS, MSX | Combined View

The game loads to this screen. It takes a while because the letters of the title assemble themselves in a humorous way. If nothing is entered the game starts a short demo sequence.

Any attempt to play the game comes up against copy protection. Find the code referred to in the code sheets. Use the up/down keys select the required letter and the left/right keys to move between the

Start of game screen.
I have 1 minute 30 seconds to complete this level
The game starts here. Poogaboo has been dropped in the cave and this is where he lands.

Poogaboo moves by jumping. The longer the action key is held down the further the jump. 
There's a row of dots at the bottom left of the screen that indicates the power of the jump
If Poogaboo hits something, he falls to the ground, or a platform if there's one beneath him. Here I mistimed the jump and hit the rock.

Another mis-timed jump. While jumping or falling he does not seem to be able to do anything. 
I think the little things moving about, there's one in the black area, are food.
The odd looking thing above Poogaboo is a dragon. This is the bad guy and any contact is fatal. It chases Poogaboo and its vital not to get trapped in a corner
Here I am, trapped, with the dragon blocking the only exit
End of game - all lives lost

Its a lousy score but its the best of this session.
The name is entered by using up/down to scroll through the alphabet and left/right to select the letter to change
